title: Junior Blue
text:
Junior Blue is a Canadian post-rock group, consisting of Justin Peroff and Dylan Hudecki, along with contributions by Peroff's Broken Social Scene bandmates Kevin Drew and Brendan Canning, and Hudecki's By Divine Right bandmates Jos√© Miguel Contreras and Brian Borcherdt.
The band released an album, Junior Blue  In the Search of Solid Gold in 2003.


== Discography ==
In the Search of Solid Gold
